Do you know and care about the difference between JUnit extensions
such as HTMLUnit and HTTPUnit? Cactus, MockObjects, and JUnitEE?
Abbot, Jemmy, JFCUnit, Marathon? If so:

Dominique Guilbaud is charged with enhancing Hyades'

http://eclipse.org/hyades/

support of JUnit extensions (e.g. HTTPUnit, Cactus, Abbot). If you
would like to recommend or help evaluate tools, or are otherwise
interested, please contact him before 30 Sep 04. For more information
(including eaddr) see the thread at

http://dev.eclipse.org/mhonarc/lists/hyades-dev/msg00974.html

To view the archives, you will need an Eclipse newsgroup password: to
get one, use

http://dev.eclipse.org/newsManager/newsRequestForm.html
